Title: ay

Text:
Announcing The Next-Generation 450% CBD Solution For Pain, Anxiety & Better Sleep

New CBD gummy relieves chronic pain, arthritis, depression, anxiety, stress, sleep disorders and dozens of other ailments 5Xs better than hemp oil and tastes absolutely delicious; read on and claim up to two bottles free!


5.1m 958,890 198,235 456,752
5.1m 958,890 198,235 456,752


By Laura Turner | Associated Health Press
Published

(NEW YORK) - For millions battling daily discomfort, this news couldn't be more exciting.

A next generation hemp-CBD technology is now available across the nation and can be purchased without a prescription. And the best part is…

It comes in the form of a tasty gummy bear and a new delivery system that’s up to 450% more effective than oil; giving you 5Xs more relief for your buck and satisfies any sweet tooth.

offer; ?> contain pure concentrated doses of hemp extract known as CBD or Cannabidiol, which can help relieve even the most agonizing joint discomfort along with general muscle aches, soreness, sleep disorders, anxiety and dozens of other ailments. And since it contains NO THC, it heals without the "high".

It also calms, relaxes, and eases tension all over the body.

A GUMMY A DAY SOOTHES PAIN AWAY: 25 milligram dose of CBD that works day and night to keep you comfortable, happy, and healthy.

Exciting new scientific research shows that hemp extract contains special relief molecules called cannabinoids or CBD which bind to receptor cites in the brain and body. When taken orally, offer; ?> activate these receptors, and soothing comfort begins to take form.

Why This New Technology Is Better Than Hemp

Unfortunately, most CBD found on the market can’t deliver a fraction of these results. “The problem is, hemp products sold on Amazon do not contain any CBD whatsoever, and then, companies selling real CBD typically come in oil form,” according to Chief Technologist Mi Hwa Kim of the Green Gardener. “Oil doesn’t breach the cell membrane, which is where the real healing happens. Our body is 80% water, our cells 90%. And you know what they say about oil and water -- they don’t mix.”

This is why offer; ?> contains a unique “water soluble” system. The technology is shown to improve absorption in the cells up to 450%, quickly boosting the body’s cannabinoid levels.

“The other problem is that most of these formulas only contain a single compound extract,” says Ms. Kim. “CBD’s pure isolate cannabinoids are shown to work synergistically. In short, they work better together. It’s called the “entourage effect.” Most miss out on the full effects because they are missing some of the best rejuvenating compounds within the hemp plant. This is why we’ve made offer; ?> with the “full hemp, low temp” extraction technology.”

“Finally, most CBD formulas are made on foreign farms with pesticides, or grown using non-organic seeds and processes. We’ve grown the hemp in offer; ?> at a 100% organic American farm, under strict agricultural guidelines. It’s grown without pesticides or GMOs. And it’s grown to contain ZERO THC which we have the test results to prove it.”



Cassandra Healy, a 52 year old grandmother from Grand Rapids Michigan was one of the first users of offer; ?>.

"I was plagued by the symptoms of Fibromyalgia and arthritis. I couldn't get out of bed. I was in pain constantly. And the 'Cures' were worse than the symptoms. They had me on harsh drugs. I was bed-ridden and severely depressed. My life was over."

"Until I found offer; ?>. Just a few days after I started taking it, I started noticing a difference. My pain has drastically reduced. I had energy again. I've been taking them for 4 months now - And I'm happy to say, I don't take any meds except CBD. It has changed my life that dramatically. I'm not exaggerating when I say CBD gave me my life back."

How It Works

The key to offer; ?>’s health benefits is the Endocannabinoid system, a network of receptors in the cells. The system is there to maintain homeostasis (balance). In response to toxins in our body, it releases cannabinoids to set things back to their natural state.

“It’s really amazing God-given system that’s been completely overlooked. Our bodies are practically designed to work with the compounds in CBD, which is why we need a solution like offer; ?> that unleashes its full potential.”

Over time, with aging, the endocannabinoid system eventually burns out. Fewer cannabinoids are released, so the body’s levels deplete. The result is, all sorts of symptoms of aging like age-related memory loss, blurry vision, joint discomfort, aches and pains, and other ailments.

In fact, a recent survey revealed that 60% of users say CBD is “more effective” than prescription medications. 75% found CBD more effective than over-the-counter products, as you can see below:


One offer; ?> Gummy boosts your endocannabinoid system – soothing aches and pains, inflammation, improving sleep cycles, mood, memory, focus, and mental acuity. And you don't need to worry about failing a drug test, there is NO THC or psychoactive effects so you get amazing relief without any “high”

Case After Case Says It Can…

  • Relieve pain by binding to CB1 receptors while reducing swelling and inflammation
  • Reduces social anxiety , cognitive impairment, and discomfort in patients diagnosed with Generalized Social Anxiety Disorder (SAD)
  • Improves sleep quality , so you get a full night’s rest and wake up refreshed with more energy
  • Increases memory and focus
  • Helps combat neurodegenerative disorders like Alzheimers by removing plaque that block neuron-signaling
  • Reduces cigarette, drug, & alcohol addiction by modulating the rewarding effects of addictive compounds
  • Helps to regulate blood sugar
  • Provides relief to those suffering from IBD (Crohn’s or Colitis) through it's anti-inflammatory effects
  • Helps to improve symptoms of MS (multiple sclerosis) by providing durable protection to neurons
  • Works to help eliminate fat by reducing appetite and cravings
  • Reduces muscle spasms and cramps
  • And tastes absolutely delicious!

Not Yet Sold In Stores

offer; ?> is formulated from organically grown hemp right here in the U.S.A. from locally owned and operated farms, and is now available nationwide. However, several major pharmaceutical companies are currently testing hemp extract in clinical settings, which means it may require a prescription in the near future. It's advised to order offer; ?> today directly from the company while you still can.


Stop Feeling Down, Sluggish, Tired, And In Pain! Change Your Life With offer; ?>!


Taking All The Risk Off Consumers

A large percentage of men and women using offer; ?> experience truly amazing results. That's why it's now being sold with a guarantee that goes way beyond the industry standard.

“We can only make this guarantee because we are 100% certain our customers will be satisfied. We want to take full risk off consumers. So in addition to offering up to two free bottles + free shipping for first time customers, we also make them a huge promise that ensures they don't have to risk a cent” says Anthony Sims, offer; ?> CEO.

Here's how it works: Take offer; ?> as directed and you must be thrilled with the results! Otherwise, simply return the empty bottles within 60 days. Then, the company will refund your money for having tried the product.

Where To Find offer; ?>

This is the official nationwide release of offer; ?> in America. And so, the company is offering up to TWO FREE BOTTLES on qualifying orders placed

A secure website has been set up for readers to place orders. This gives everyone an equal chance to try offer; ?>.

offer; ?> Gummies may be of tremendous importance to you or a loved one. It can show you how the blessings of a cure from daily discomfort — freedom from pain, anxiety, and sleepless nights — can be yours once again, no matter your age and no matter how long you have suffered.

If you are not convinced that this is the most important product in your daily health regimen — a product that may show you or a loved one how to enjoy absolutely pain-free living and an anxiety-free life — return it at once and the company will promptly issue a complete refund, no questions asked.

This offer won’t last for long so make sure you follow the link below to Claim up to TWO FREE Bottles + FREE shipping!

       

IMPORTANT: Due to offer; ?>s' growing popularity and recent media exposure this offer will likely be gone. Please leave your details to be first in line if you miss out today.

Click Here and Claim up to TWO FREE Bottles on Qualifying Orders!


Current Stock LOW, Sell-Out Risk HIGH

 
5.1m 992,298 178,921 752,498
5.1m 992,298 178,921 752,498

To your health,

Laura Turner
Associated Health Press

P.S. The natural pain relief miracle you’re about to discover was off limits for more than 80 years. Greedy drug companies made sure you couldn’t get your hands on it. They didn’t want you to have a proven natural remedy that fights arthritis, anxiety, joint aches, insomnia, and inflammation safely and without a prescription. This could be your one and only chance to learn more and try it yourself before Big Pharma tries to get it banned again. Try offer; ?> RISK-FREE!





"I've had Rheumatoid Arthritis since I was 28. IT WAS LITERALLY KILLING ME! And the meds they put me on were even worse. CBD stopped my pain, healed my inflammation and all without any side effects. As far as I'm concerned, it is a miracle."

Tiffany C.
Philadelphia, PA

"Social Anxiety has stopped me from living my life. I didn't have friends, I never had a relationship. But CBD has changed all that. I can talk to people - in person - my therapist has started recommending it to all of her patients after seeing the change in me."

Christina Novotney
Seattle, WA

"I'm an old man, I just thought, well, this is it, I'm never going to be able to really live life again. I gave up. Until my daughter bought me offer; ?>. My whole life changed. I had less pain, more energy and I could play golf, play with the grandkids, no more sleeping all day - no more pain."

Carl Keeton
Denver, CO

"I have been using offer; ?> since they first came out. And honestly, I have never had anything that has helped me more. Pain - gone. Anxiety - gone. Depression - gone. I took about a week for it to fully kick in, but I have never looked back, best thing I have ever done for myself."

Brian Smith
Houston, TX

"I've tried more than 50 CBD products and this is hands down the BEST! I have bad joint pains, sore muscles and trouble sleeping through the night, this helps immensely! Also the best tasting CBD gummies I have ever had. offer; ?> really stands behind their customers!!!"

Jason
Reno, NV

Special Offer

New Customers Only:

CLICK HERE to Claim up to TWO FREE Bottles on Qualified Orders

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
function countdown(minutes) {
var seconds = 60;
var mins = minutes;
function tick() {
var counter = document.getElementById("counter");
var current_minutes = mins-1;
seconds--;
counter.innerHTML = "Offer reserved for " + current_minutes.toString() + ":" + (seconds < 10 ? "0" : "")  + String(seconds);
if( seconds > 0 ) {
setTimeout(tick, 1000);
} else {
if(mins > 1){
countdown(mins-1);
}
}
}
tick();
}
countdown(15);
});
</script>

<style>a, article, aside, body, div, footer, h1, h2, h3, h4, header, li, main, nav, p, section, ul {

    padding: 0
}

.Article {

i {

a {

.Wrapper {

}

.HeaderWrapper {

}

}

@keyframes pulse {
    0% {
        transform: scale(.9);
        opacity: .7
    }
    50% {
        transform: scale(1);
        opacity: 1
    }
    to {
        transform: scale(.9);
        opacity: .7
    }
}

@-webkit-keyframes pulse {
    0% {
        -webkit-transform: scale(.95);
        opacity: .7
    }
    50% {
        -webkit-transform: scale(1);
        opacity: 1
    }
    to {
        -webkit-transform: scale(.95);
        opacity: .7
    }
}

}

a.captioned-image img {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

a.captioned-image span.caption {
    background: grey;
    color: #fff;
    display: block;
    padding: 9px;
    margin-top: -5px
}

.time_circles {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%
}

img {
    max-width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

#comments.fb {
    margin: auto !important;
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.36em;
    display: flex
}

#comments.fb .comments-container {
    width: 100%
}

#comments.fb p, #comments.fb span {
    font-family: CNN Sans Display W04 Light, sans-serif;
    margin-bottom: 0
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fba, #comments.fb a {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: #3b5998;
    cursor: pointer
}

#comments.fb .fba:hover, #comments.fb a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before, #comments.fb .fb-reply:before {
    content: " ";
    color: #7f7f7f;
    display: inline-block
}

#comments.fb .fb-counter:before {
    content: url(index.html);
    display: inline-block;
    transform: translate(20px, 7px)
}

#comments.fb .fb-name {
    font-weight: 700
}

#comments.fb .fb-article {
    margin: 5px 0;
    font-size: 14px
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: #7f7f7f
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-like, #comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-reply {
    color: #627aad
}

#comments.fb .fb-meta .fb-counter em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 13px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 1px;
    margin-right: 3px
}

#comments.fb .fb-heading {
    font-weight: 700;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 0 0 24px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit {
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin: 0 0 24px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input {
    border: 1px solid #d3d6db;
    padding: 15px
}

#comments.fb .fb-submit .fb-input input {
    font-size: 14px;
    border: none;
    outline: none
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer {
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 12px 0;
    margin: 24px 0 0;
    border-top: 1px solid #d3d6db
}

#comments.fb .fb-footer em:before {
    content: "";
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    background-size: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    top: 2px;
    margin-right: 6px
}

#comments.fb ul {
    position: relative;
    list-style-type: none
}

#comments.fb ul li {
    padding-left: 60px;
    margin-bottom: 12px
}

#comments.fb ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul {
    border-left: 1px dotted #d3d6db;
    margin: 12px 0 24px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li {
    padding-left: 60px
}

#comments.fb ul li ul li img {
    position: absolute;
    left: 10px;
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px
}

#comments.fb p {
    font-weight: 400
}

.benefits-table {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
    text-decoration: none;
    background: #f9faf2;
    padding: .81rem
}

@media (max-width: 603px) {
    .benefits-table {
        padding: .81rem;
        flex-flow: column
    }

    .benefits-table img {
        max-width: 306px
    }
}

.benefits-table:hover, .benefits-table:hover * {
    text-decoration: none !important
}

.benefits-table > div {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    flex: 0 0 50%
}

.benefits-table img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%
}

.benefits-table ul {
    list-style-type: none
}

.benefits-table ul li {
    display: flex;
    padding: .81rem;
    align-items: baseline;
    color: #333
}

.benefits-table ul li:before {
    font-family: Font Awesome\ 5 Free;
    content: "\F058";
    margin-right: .45rem
}

span.intro-letter {
    display: inline-block;
    float: left;
    font-size: 3.6rem;
    height: 2.7rem;
    vertical-align: top;
    padding-right: .18rem;
    line-height: 3.24rem;
    font-family: Times, serif, Georgia
}

.main-content-wrap {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap
}

.full-width-wrap {
    width: 100%;
    padding-left: 5%;
    padding-right: 5%
}

@media (min-width: 961px) {
    .main-content-wrap .Article {
        order: 1
    }

    .full-width-wrap {
        order: 3
    }

    .Sidebar {
        order: 2
    }
}

.week-container {
    display: flex;
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, .18);
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 1.8rem;
    border-radius: 5px;
    min-height: 216px
}

@media (max-width: 451px) {
    .week-container {
        flex-flow: column;
        align-items: center
    }
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap {
    display: flex;
    align-items: baseline;
    margin-top: 18px;
    margin-left: .81rem
}

.week-container .week-img-wrap > div {
    width: 100%
}

.week-container > div:first-of-type {
    flex: 0 0 176px
}

.week-container > div:last-of-type {
    padding: .81rem
}

.week-container img {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: auto
}

.mt-1 {
    margin-top: 1.08rem
}

.progress {
    width: 100%;
    height: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 1.08rem;
    background: #ff8a8a;
    overflow: hidden
}

.progress-bar {
    transition: .18s ease-in-out
}

.product-box a.offer-button {
    background: #67c908
}</style>
<style>.fa {
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    display: inline-block;
    font-style: normal;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-rendering: auto;
    line-height: 1
}

.fa-angle-down:before {
}

.fa-bars:before {
}

.fa-search:before {
}

.sr-only {
    border: 0;
    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
    height: 1px;
    margin: -1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 0;
    position: absolute;
    width: 1px
}

.fa {
    font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"
}

.fa {
    font-weight: 900
}</style>
<link href="../../favicon.ico" rel="shortcut icon" type="image/x-icon">
<meta http-equiv="x-dns-prefetch-control" content="on">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://www.facebook.com/">
<link rel="dns-prefetch" href="http://accounts.google.com/">


<script type="text/javascript">
    function today(delta) {
        var ld = new Date(Date.now() + (86400000 * delta));
        return document.write(ld.toLocaleDateString());
    }
</script>
